LanguageData.BM_SpacerMinigunCombatModule.label: minigun module
LanguageData.BM_SpacerMinigunCombatModule.description: A high-tech combat-oriented device that can be installed into any compatible artificial arm replacement. This particular model includes a modified minigun that can be fully retracted outside of combat, allowing the wielder to carry it around comfortably with no interference during daily tasks.
